ygData.msgSnippet: To the folks participating in the Beachcomber and Redhot actions, I was wondering if the posts are under another heading as I haven t been able to find it

To the folks participating in the "Beachcomber and Redhot" actions, I 
was wondering if the posts are under another heading as I haven't been 
able to find it (The last posts I'm aware of are under 37934 and 
37935). Either that or nobody's posted recently.

I'm just curious.  I've not seen any posts under the heading for a  
few days but the regulars are still participating. It seems logical 
that I've missed the posts under a different heading. 
(Oh my gowd...I sounded like Shockwave...) Somebody correct me if I've 
been a complete ditz.... *wink*

Roll'n and rocking.

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
